ONe thing that could be a gotcha is that, when you define your ClassPath, 
there can be no spaces between the semi colon separated paths in the 
ClassPath.

I had a space after the .; (current directory) path, and apparently all 
paths thereafter were not being honored.  As a saftey check, make sure you 
have no stray spaces in your CP definition.
